training.title: AI Training Protocols
training.subtitle: Access advanced AI-powered protocols to optimize your pet's behavior and wellbeing
training.protocolCreatedDescription: The training protocol has been created successfully
training.protocolDeletedDescription: The protocol has been deleted successfully

descriptions.Stabilire un ambiente sicuro e confortev: Establish a safe and comfortable environment where the animal can relax and build confidence. This exercise creates the foundation for all other social training.
descriptions.Costruire fiducia tra animale e handler: Build trust between animal and handler through positive interactions and constant reinforcement.
descriptions.Permettere all'animale di osservare l'am: Allow the animal to observe the surrounding environment without direct interaction pressure.

instructions.Scegli uno spazio tranquillo e familiare: Choose a quiet and familiar space for the animal
instructions.Posiziona il tappetino comfort in un ang: Place the comfort mat in a safe corner
instructions.Offri snack premio quando l'animale si a: Offer reward treats when the animal approaches spontaneously
instructions.Mantieni distanza e lascia che l'animale: Keep distance and let the animal explore freely
instructions.Rinforza positivamente ogni comportament: Positively reinforce every calm and relaxed behavior
instructions.BODY LANGUAGE: Osserva postura rilassata: BODY LANGUAGE: Observe relaxed posture, tail in neutral position
instructions.BODY LANGUAGE: Cerca respiro regolare e: BODY LANGUAGE: Look for regular breathing and relaxed ears
instructions.BODY LANGUAGE: Evita segnali stress come: BODY LANGUAGE: Avoid stress signals like panting or trembling
instructions.Osserva postura rilassata, coda in posiz: Observe relaxed posture, tail in neutral position
instructions.Cerca respiro regolare e orecchie rilass: Look for regular breathing and relaxed ears
instructions.Evita segnali stress come ansimare o tre: Avoid stress signals like panting or trembling

targetBehaviors.Migliorare competenze sociali, ridurre t: Improve social skills, reduce shyness, increase confidence in interactions

dashboard.interruptProtocolDescription: Are you sure you want to interrupt this protocol? All progress will be lost.
dashboard.tipText: Always maintain a positive and patient attitude. If your pet doesn't respond immediately, repeat the exercise more slowly and reward them for every small progress.
dashboard.congratulationsMessage: Congratulations! You have successfully completed the entire protocol "{{protocolTitle}}" and your rating has been saved!
dashboard.ratingDialogDescription: Congratulations! You have completed the entire protocol "{{protocolTitle}}". Your rating will help us improve our protocols.
dashboard.commentsPlaceholder: Share your experience: what worked best? What could you improve?

socializzazioneProgressiva.title: Progressive Socialization
socializzazioneProgressiva.description: 5-day protocol to improve the animal's social skills with other animals and people. Gradual and positive approach for shy or poorly socialized animals, with focus on confidence building and controlled interactions.

controlloAggressivitaReattiva.title: Reactive Aggression Control
controlloAggressivitaReattiva.description: Advanced protocol for safe management of reactive aggression. Absolute priority on safety, impulse control and development of alternative behaviors. Requires professional supervision.

gestioneAnsiaSeparazione.title: Separation Anxiety Management
gestioneAnsiaSeparazione.description: Scientific protocol to reduce separation anxiety through gradual desensitization. Develops independence and tranquility during owner absences with ultra-gradual approach.

rieducazioneAlimentareComportamentale.title: Behavioral Food Re-education
rieducazioneAlimentareComportamentale.description: Intermediate protocol to resolve behavioral disorders related to feeding. Addresses compulsive eating, food refusal, food guarding and food anxiety through a gradual and non-punitive approach.

ottimizzazioneCicloSonnoVeglia.title: Sleep-Wake Cycle Optimization
ottimizzazioneCicloSonnoVeglia.description: Specialized protocol to establish healthy sleep patterns, reduce insomnia and night awakenings. Through pre-sleep routines, environmental optimization and circadian regulation, helps animals develop natural and restorative rest habits.

superareFobiePaureSpecifiche.title: Overcoming Specific Phobias and Fears
superareFobiePaureSpecifiche.description: Advanced systematic desensitization program to overcome intense phobias of noises, objects and specific situations through gradual scientific techniques

stopComportamentiDistruttivi.title: Stop Destructive Behaviors
stopComportamentiDistruttivi.description: Intensive protocol to eliminate destructive chewing, excessive digging and destruction of household objects.

gestioneGelosiaEPossessivita.title: Jealousy and Possessiveness Management
gestioneGelosiaEPossessivita.description: Specialized protocol to reduce possessive behaviors and jealousy in pets. Includes advanced desensitization techniques, sharing training and resource management.

riattivazioneEnergiaMotivazione.title: Energy and Motivation Reactivation
riattivazioneEnergiaMotivazione.description: Gradual protocol to combat depression, apathy and loss of interest in animals. Gentle and progressive approach to awaken motivation through sensory stimuli, physical activation and restoration of social interest.

gestioneIperattivatEDeficitAttenzione.title: Hyperactivity and Attention Deficit Management
gestioneIperattivatEDeficitAttenzione.description: Complete protocol to reduce hyperactivity and improve concentration through a progressive approach: from constructive energy discharge to impulse control, up to relaxation and self-control.

descriptions.Protocollo di 5 giorni per migliorare le: 5-day protocol to improve the animal's social skills with other animals and people. Gradual and positive approach for shy or under-socialized animals, with focus on confidence building and controlled interactions.
descriptions.Protocollo avanzato per la gestione sicu: Advanced protocol for safe management of reactive aggression. Absolute priority on safety, impulse control and developing alternative behaviors. Requires professional supervision.
descriptions.Protocollo scientifico per ridurre l'ans: Scientific protocol to reduce separation anxiety through gradual desensitization. Develops independence and tranquility during owner absence with ultra-gradual approach.
descriptions.Protocollo intermedio per risolvere dist: Intermediate protocol to resolve food-related behavioral disorders. Addresses compulsive eating, food refusal, food guarding and food anxiety through a gradual and non-punitive approach.
descriptions.Protocollo specializzato per stabilire p: Specialized protocol to establish healthy sleep patterns, reduce insomnia and nighttime awakenings. Through pre-sleep routines, environmental optimization and circadian regulation, helps animals develop natural and restorative rest habits.
descriptions.Programma avanzato di desensibilizzazion: Advanced systematic desensitization program to overcome intense phobias of noises, objects and specific situations through gradual scientific techniques
descriptions.Protocollo intensivo per eliminare masti: Intensive protocol to eliminate destructive chewing, excessive digging and destruction of household objects.
descriptions.Protocollo specializzato per ridurre com: Specialized protocol to reduce possessive behaviors and jealousy in pets. Includes advanced desensitization techniques, sharing training and resource management.
descriptions.Protocollo graduale per combattere depre: Gradual protocol to combat depression, apathy and loss of interest in animals. Gentle and progressive approach to awaken motivation through sensory stimuli, physical activation and restoration of social interest.
descriptions.Protocollo completo per ridurre iperatti: Complete protocol to reduce hyperactivity and improve concentration through a progressive approach: from constructive energy discharge to impulse control, to relaxation and self-control.

emptyState.description: Start by creating your first personalized training protocol.
